titles: A proclamation, indemnifying deserters, who shall return to their Majesties service.
author: Scotland. Privy Council.
Scotland. Sovereign (1689-1694 : William and Mary)
publisher: Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, Printer to their most excellent Majesties,
notes: Dated: Given under Our Signet at Edinburgh, the fifth day of Aprile. And of Our Reign the fourth year 1693.
Signed: Gilb. Eliot, Cls Sti. Concilii.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
keywords: Military deserters --  Legal status, laws, etc. --  Scotland --  Early works to 1800.
